actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security to provide coverage for services of registered nurses as assistance at surgery.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover, on an assigned basis, the services of registered nurses which are performed under the supervision of a physician in a hospital, skilled nursing facility, or nursing facility under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of the Medicare program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security to provide coverage for services of registered nurses as assistance at surgery.
